DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate drug interaction fostamatinib rifampicin compare safety , tolerability plasma concentration fostamatinib administer alone rifampicin healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: Effects Administration Fostamatinib Blood Concentrations Rifampicin Healthy Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure Males female age 18 55 year ( inclusive ) Minimum weight 50 kg body mass index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Female subject must negative pregnancy test screen admission treatment period , must lactate , must nonchildbearing potential History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease ( except cholecystectomy ) Any clinically significant illness , medical surgical procedure , trauma within 4 week Period 1 Day 1 Subjects smoke 5 cigarette equivalent tobacco per day Absolute neutrophil count less 2500/mm3 2.5 x 109/L Any previous treatment fostamatinib
